unkown_error: An unknown error has occurred. Please try again and report the bug using `/bug` if the problem persists.
welcome:
Welcome to {botName}! I set your language to `{language}`. You can edit your preferences in the settings using `/settings`.
To get started, use the `/help` command.

no_access.beta: Command canceled. You need to be part of the beta program to use this command.
no_access.dev: Command canceled. Only developers can use this command.
no_access.staff: Command canceled. Only staff can use this command.
no_access.game: Command canceled. You need to be in a game to use this command.
no_access.private: Command canceled. The user set its profile to private.
no_access.paginator: Action canceled. Please request your own message.

github.bug:
Bug reported! Thank you for your contribution! You can view it here: <{url}>
 Any additional information and pictures can be commented there too.
github.suggestion:
Suggestion received! Thank you for your contribution! You can view it here: <{url}>
 Any additional information and pictures can be commented there too.

error.unknown: An unknown error has occurred. Please try again and report the bug using `/bug` if the problem persists.

not_found.user: User not found. The user you tried to find is not in our database yet.

settings.updated: Your settings have been updated! Your {setting} has been set to `{new}`. Previous value: `{old}`
